items.title: Product Disclosure Statement
items.description: Contains all the important information needed to make an informed decision about joining Future Super.

items.title: Financial Services Guide
items.description: Contains important information about who we are and your rights as a client.

title: Forms for individuals
description: Forms you will need to become a member of Future Super, as well as forms regarding rollovers, withdrawals, insurance and other transactions with the fund.

items.title: Application Form (Online)
items.description: Complete this form to become a member of the Future Super fund. Alternatively, you can contact us for a copy of our paper application form.

items.title: General Compliance Certificate
items.description: Employers may require this form to be completed when an employee chooses to join Future Super. It states we are a compliant fund and can accept super contributions on member's behalf.
